content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia Müller. Thank you for considering my apartment in Munich. I'm open to negotiating on the rental price, but I would like to emphasize that I am a landlord and I want to maximize my gains. Could you please provide me with an initial offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 600 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Emilia. While I appreciate your willingness to pay 600 Euros per month, I would like to explore other options. Would you be able to offer a higher rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 550 Euros per month.

I would like to add that I am a student and I will be living alone in the apartment. I am dependable and responsible and I will take good care of the apartment.

If you have any concerns, please let me know.

Thank you for your time.

Sincerely,

Emilia Müller
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Emilia. While I appreciate your willingness to pay 550 Euros per month, I would like to explore other options. Could you please provide me with any additional information about your background and why you would be a good fit for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine
